post:
HostSlick.com has a simple aim. We provide our customers with high quality servers but keep prices down. We have networks in Lelystad, Netherlands and have an average ticket response time of around 25-45 minutes at most.
Our goals are to offer our valued clients a great experience and offer the best Affordable and most Reliable Hosting arround.


Why HostSlick?

  • Wide range of Payment methods accepted
  • Complimentary 100Gbps Corero SmartWalls DDoS Protection with any Service for occasional attacks that may happen.
  • Own Hardware, Network in The Netherlands.
  • Network based on industry leading Juniper & Cisco Equipment
  • Support On-Site for Emergencies 24x7
  • 24x7 Monitored
  • Friendly Sales/Support Staff.
  • Long-Term running business. Founded in 2010
  • We love Servers and their Noise they make!!



    Every VPS and WebHost includes
    • BlazingFast SSDs
    • Fast 1Gbit Uplink
    • WebHosting: DirectAdmin Control Panel - VPS: Virtualizor Control Panel
    • Easy to use Panels!
    • Automated Re-Installs, reboot, boot, shutdown etc. Manage your Cloud VPS from panel without need of a ticket!
    • Fast 24/7 Support by professionals









      Payment Methods (automated!)
      Paysafecard
      Bitcoin
      Giropay
      SofortBanking/SofortÜberweisung
      PayPal
